algo_summary: HTC-BDD algorithm for minimal hitting set computations
algo_description:
Introduced in Hypergraph transversal computation with binary decision diagrams by T. Toda. Available algorithms:
  • todaFull HTC-BDD algorithm.
  • knuthKnuth algorithm from Knuth's 'The Art of Computer Programming' vol. 4 ยง7.1.4.
Container sources available at the CompSysMed group Github page.

algo_authors.name: Takahisa Toda
algo_authors.organization: Discrete Structure Manipulation System Project, Japan Science and Technology Agency, Hokkaido University,
